## R as a calculator

R can be used for simple calculator operations:
```{r echo = TRUE, collapse = TRUE}
1  + 3
```

***
but to make the calculations easier, you can assign numbers to variables:
```{r echo = TRUE, collapse = TRUE}
a <- 1
b <- 4

a + b
a * b
b / a
b - a
```
